Articles.Content:
This might be a bug, but I'll post here and let the mods decide if it belongs here.

In career mode the flag flying at a level 1 or 2 launchpad displays the basic KSP flag and not the flag flown at the main pole or assigned to the mission. It appears that the mission/program flag is displayed at the level 3 launchpad, but I have only tested this in sandbox mode as I haven't unlocked it in career mode yet.
